verses.text_uthmani: يسٓ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yā sīn.
verses.translation: Йа - Син

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْءَانِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11176'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wal-qur'ānil-ḥakīm(i).
verses.translation: В знак Корана, исполненного мудрости (Господней)

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innaka laminal-mursalīn(a).
verses.translation: Поистине, стоишь в одном ряду с посланниками Бога ты

verses.text_uthmani: عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَلَىٰ صِر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':726'>طٍ م</tajweed>ُّسْتَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: 'Alā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
verses.translation: На праведной стезе

verses.text_uthmani: تَنزِيلَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11177'>نز</tajweed>ِيلَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11178'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَزِيزِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9869'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Tanzīlal-'azīzir-raḥīm(i).
verses.translation: И в этом - откровение, ниспосланное Им, Кто Всемогущ (над всем) и милосердия исполнен

verses.text_uthmani: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَـٰفِلُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Litunżira qaumam mā unżira ābā'uhum fahum gāfilūn(a).
verses.translation: Чтоб мог ты тех предостеречь, Отцы которых, не приняв предупреждений Наших, Остались глухи ко знамениям Аллаха

verses.text_uthmani: لَقَدْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2389'>دْ</tajweed> حَقَّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':10639'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَوْلُ عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Laqad ḥaqqal-qaulu 'alā akṡarihim fahum lā yu'minūn(a).
verses.translation: Господне Слово оказалось справедливым, Карая большинство из них за то, Что отвергали веру

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِىٓ أَعْنَـٰقِهِمْ أَغْلَـٰلًا فَهِىَ إِلَى ٱلْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā ja'alnā fī a'nāqihim aglālan fa hiya ilal-ażqāni fahum muqmaḥūn(a).
verses.translation: Поистине, Мы в кольца заточили шеи их до самых подбородков, И поневоле головы их вверх обращены

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَجَعَلْنَا م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':4612'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَد<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11184'>ًّا و</tajweed>َمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَد<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11185'>ًّا ف</tajweed>َأَغْشَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':60'>بْ</tajweed>صِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ja'alnā mim baini aidīhim saddaw wa min khalfihim saddan fa agsyaināhum fahum lā yubṣirūn(a).
verses.translation: А перед ними и за их спиной Мы возвели (высокие) преграды, Чтобы лишить возможности их видеть

verses.text_uthmani: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَسَو<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':25'>نذ</tajweed>َرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':26'>نذ</tajweed>ِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa sawā'un 'alaihim a'anżartahum am lam tunżirhum lā yu'minūn(a).
verses.translation: И ту же кару понесут они. Пошлешь ты им предупреждение иль нет, - В Аллаха не уверуют они

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَخَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innamā tunżiru manittaba'aż-żikra  wa khasyiyar-raḥmāna bil-gaib(i), fa basysyirhu bimagfiratiw wa ajrin karīm(in).
verses.translation: Предостеречь ты можешь только тех, Кто следует Напоминанию, (низведенному свыше), И в глубине души благоговеет перед Милосердным. Обрадуй их прощением (Господним) И благороднейшей (из всех) наград

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا۟ وَءَاثَـٰرَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ فِىٓ إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā naḥnu nuḥyil-mautā wa naktubu mā qaddamū wa āṡārahum, wa kulla syai'in aḥṣaināhu fī imāmim mubīn(in).
verses.translation: Мы жизнь мертвым возвращаем И счет ведем тому, Что в жизни ближней эти люди совершили И что оставили (в сей жизни) за спиной, И это все Мы в Ясной Книге поместили

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَآءَهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>ضْرِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8060'>بْ</tajweed> لَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':8061'>ُم م</tajweed>َّثَلاً أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11193'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11194'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُرْسَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Waḍrib lahum maṡalan aṣḥābal-qaryah(ti), iż jā'ahal-mursalūn(a).
verses.translation: Ты изложи им притчу о жителях селенья: И вот явились к ним посланники Господни

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذْ أَرْسَلْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَيْهِمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11195'>ٱ</tajweed>ثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11196'>ثٍ ف</tajweed>َقَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَيْك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':11197'>ُم م</tajweed>ُّرْسَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iż arsalnā ilaihimuṡnaini fa każżabūhumā fa 'azzaznā biṡāliṡin faqālū innā ilaikum mursalūn(a).
verses.translation: Мы к ним отправили двоих, Но их они отвергли. На помощь им Мы третьего послали, И людям молвили они: "Поистине, мы к вам Аллахом посланы сюда

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū mā antum illā basyarum miṡlunā, wa mā anzalar-raḥmānu min syai'(in), in antum illā takżibūn(a).
verses.translation: Но жители сказали им: "Всего лишь люди вы, подобные всем нам, И никакого откровения не дал вам Милосердный. Несете вы одну лишь только ложь

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū rabbunā ya'lamu innā ilaikum lamursalūn(a).
verses.translation: Они, (посланники), сказали им: "И все же знает наш Господь, Что с миссией Его мы к вам пришли

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا عَلَيْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا عَلَيْن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَّا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3819'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>غُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3781'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā 'alainā illal-balāgul-mubīn(u).
verses.translation: На нас возложено вам ясное посланье передать

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا۟ لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū innā taṭayyarnā bikum, la'il lam tantahū lanarjumannakum wa layamassannakum minnā 'ażābun alīm(un).
verses.translation: Они ж ответили: "Мы в вас увидели зловещую примету, И, если вы не прекратите (миссии своей), Мы забросаем вас камнями, И нами уготовано для вас мучительное наказанье

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ طَـٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū ṭā'irukum ma'akum, a'in żukkirtum, bal antum qaumum musrifūn(a).
verses.translation: (Посланники) так отвечали: "При вас останутся зловещие приметы, Коль наши увещания бесплодны. Поистине, вы преступили все пределы

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَآءَ مِنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ مِنْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':10108'>قْ</tajweed>صَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':10109'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَدِينَةِ رَجُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11203'>لٌ ي</tajweed>َسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قَوْمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11204'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّبِعُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11205'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُرْسَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa jā'a min aqṣal-madīnati rajuluy yas'ā qāla yā qaumittabi'ul-mursalīn(a).
verses.translation: И прибежал из самой удаленной части человек И возгласил: "О люди! Прислушайтесь к посланникам Аллаха

verses.text_uthmani: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَن لَّا يَسْـَٔلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ittabi'ū mal lā yas'alukum ajraw wa hum muhtadūn(a).
verses.translation: И следуйте за теми, Кто никаких наград себе от вас не ждет И сам идет прямой стезёю

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا لِىَ ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَعْبُدُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11207'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā liya lā a'budul-lażī faṭaranī wa ilaihi turja'ūn(a).
verses.translation: Ужель не поклоняться мне Тому, Кто сотворил меня И у Кого сойдутся все дороги наши

verses.text_uthmani: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: A'attakhiżu min dūnihī ālihatan iy yuridnir-raḥmānu biḍurril lā tugni 'annī syafā'atuhum syai'aw wa lā yunqiżūn(i).
verses.translation: Ужель в служении Единому Ему Я стану измышлять других богов? Ведь если Милосердный зла мне пожелает, Заступничество их мне не поможет И избавленья мне не принесет

verses.text_uthmani: إِنِّىٓ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innī iżal lafī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
verses.translation: Здесь я предстал бы в явном заблужденье

verses.text_uthmani: إِنِّىٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَٱسْمَعُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> ءَامَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6185'>نت</tajweed>ُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11214'>ٱ</tajweed>سْمَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innī  āmantu birabbikum fasma'ūn(i).
verses.translation: Поистине, уверовал я в вашего Владыку, А потому прислушайтесь ко мне, о люди!" [Когда ж, каменьями побитый, умер он]

verses.text_uthmani: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قِيلَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11215'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11216'>دْ</tajweed>خُلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11217'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َةَۖ قَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qīladkhulil-jannah(ta), qāla yā laita qaumī ya'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Было повелено: "Ты в Рай войди!" И он сказал: "О, если б знали мои люди

verses.text_uthmani: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11218'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُكْرَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Bimā gafaralī rabbī wa ja'alanī minal-mukramīn(a).
verses.translation: За что Господь мне дал прощенье И почестью Своею наделил

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':515'>نز</tajweed>َلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':254'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>َعْدِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11219'>ن ج</tajweed>ُن<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11220'>دٍ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':64'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ وَمَا كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا مُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11221'>نز</tajweed>ِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā anzalnā 'alā qaumihī mim ba'dihī min jundim minas-samā'i wa mā kunnā munzilīn(a).
verses.translation: [Вслед за его кончиной] На его людей Мы воинства небесного не слали - Нам в этом не было нужды

verses.text_uthmani: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَـٰمِدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':489'>ن ك</tajweed>َانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11222'>ةً و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِدَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11223'>ةً ف</tajweed>َإِذَا هُمْ خَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مِد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: In kānat illā ṣaiḥataw wāḥidatan fa'iżā hum khāmidūn(a).
verses.translation: Один лишь вскрик - И вот они погасли (и канули в небытие)

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰحَسْرَةً عَلَى ٱلْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>حَسْرَةً عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11224'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعِبَادِ‌ۚ مَا يَأْتِيه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':7205'>ِم م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':2882'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> يَسْتَهْزِء<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yā ḥasratan 'alal-'ibād(i), mā ya'tīhim mir rasūlin illā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
verses.translation: О, горе для (Моих) рабов! К ним не приходит ни один посланник, Которого они б не осмеяли

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَمْ يَرَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8394'>بْ</tajweed>لَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':8646'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6524'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرُونِ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Alam yarau kam ahlaknā qablahum minal-qurūni annahum ilaihim lā yarji'ūn(a).
verses.translation: Ужель не видели они те поколения людей, Которые до них Мы погубили? Ужель не ведают, Что никогда они к ним не вернутся

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11225'>ن ك</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11226'>لٌّ ل</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا جَمِي<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11227'>عٌ ل</tajweed>َّدَيْنَا مُحْضَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa in kullul lammā jamī'ul ladainā muḥḍarūn(a).
verses.translation: Поистине, их всех до одного Представят перед Нами (в Судный День)

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ ٱلْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَـٰهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَءَايَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11228'>ةٌ ل</tajweed>َّهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11229'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11230'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَا وَأَخْرَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11231'>جْ</tajweed>نَا مِنْهَا حَب<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11232'>ًّا ف</tajweed>َمِنْهُ يَأْكُل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa āyatul lahumul-arḍul-maitah(tu), aḥyaināhā wa akhrajnā minhā ḥabban faminhu ya'kulūn(a).
verses.translation: Знамением для них - умершая земля. Ее Мы оживим, взрастим зерно на ней, И им они питаться будут

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْعُيُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9169'>تٍ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':1568'>ِن ن</tajweed>َّخِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':1569'>لٍ و</tajweed>َأَعْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11233'>بٍ و</tajweed>َفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11234'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعُي<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ja'alnā fīhā jannātim min nakhīliw wa a'nābiw wa fajjarnā fīhā minal-'uyūn(i).
verses.translation: Сады Мы возведем из виноградных лоз и пальм И родники в них изольем обильно

verses.text_uthmani: لِيَأْكُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِيَأْكُلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4468'>ن ث</tajweed>َمَرِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ‌ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Liya'kulū min ṡamarihī wa mā 'amilathu aidīhim, afalā yasykurūn(a).
verses.translation: Чтобы плодами их вы все могли питаться. Но это все не вашими руками созданО. Ужель за это вы не будете Нам благодарны

verses.text_uthmani: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7648'>بْ</tajweed>حَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7649'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11235'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَزْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>جَ كُلَّهَا مِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا تُ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':308'>نۢب</tajweed>ِتُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':309'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':568'>نف</tajweed>ُسِهِمْ وَمِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا لَا يَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Subḥānal-lażī khalaqal-azwāja kullahā mimmā tumbitul-arḍu wa min anfusihim wa mimmā lā ya'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Хвала Тому, Кто в пАрах создал все, Что жизнь на земле рождает! Попарно существуют души ваши И все Незримое, что окружает вас И что доселе ваше знанье не постигло

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَءَايَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11228'>ةٌ ل</tajweed>َّهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11236'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11237'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَارَ فَإِذَا ه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':11238'>ُم م</tajweed>ُّظْلِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa āyatul lahumul-lailu naslakhu minhun-nahāra fa'iżā hum muẓlimūn(a).
verses.translation: Знамением для вас приходит ночь, И из нее Мы извлекаем свет дневной, - И вот (уж вновь) они во мрак погружены

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلشَّمْسُ تَجْرِى لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّمْسُ تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':120'>جْ</tajweed>رِى لِمُسْتَقَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11239'>رٍّ ل</tajweed>َّهَا‌ۚ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ تَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4267'>قْ</tajweed>دِيرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4268'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَزِيزِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4269'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wasy-syamsu tajrī limustaqarril lahā, żālika taqdīrul-'azīzil-'alīm(i).
verses.translation: И солнце завершает путь За срок, определенный для него. Таков приказ Того, Кто преисполнен мощи и познанья

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَـٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلْعُرْجُونِ ٱلْقَدِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11240'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعُرْجُونِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11241'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wal-qamara qaddarnāhu manāzila ḥattā 'āda kal-'urjūnil-qadīm(i).
verses.translation: Мы для луны установили Срок прохожденья каждой фазы И новое явление ее земле, Подобно ветви старой пальмы

verses.text_uthmani: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11242'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّمْسُ يَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':8425'>نۢب</tajweed>َغِى لَه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11243'>ن ت</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11244'>دْ</tajweed>رِكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11245'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَمَرَ وَلَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11246'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّيْلُ سَابِقُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11247'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَارِ‌ۚ وَكُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11248'>لٌّ ف</tajweed>ِى فَلَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8732'>كٍ ي</tajweed>َسْبَح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lasy-syamsu yambagī lahā an tudrikal-qamara wa lal-lailu sābiqun-nahār(i), wa kullun fī falakiy yasbaḥūn(a).
verses.translation: И солнцу не дано настичь луну, И ночь не сможет день опередить, - Всему назначено проплыть свой путь по своду

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَءَايَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11249'>ةٌ ل</tajweed>َّهُمْ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4780'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفُلْكِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9808'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَشْح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa āyatul lahum annā ḥamalnā żurriyyatahum fil-fulkil-masyḥūn(i).
verses.translation: И вновь знамение для них - Что Мы несли их предков (Через потоп) в нагруженном ковчеге

verses.text_uthmani: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَخَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11250'>قْ</tajweed>نَا لَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':1812'>ُم م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':104'>ِن م</tajweed>ِّثْلِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> مَا يَرْكَب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa khalaqnā lahum mim miṡlihī mā yarkabūn(a).
verses.translation: И сотворили Мы для них Подобные (тому ковчегу) корабли, На коих (воздух и моря) они пересекают

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11251'>ِن ن</tajweed>َّشَأْ نُغْرِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11252'>قْ</tajweed>هُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11253'>نق</tajweed>َذ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa in nasya' nugriqhum falā ṣarīkha lahum wa lā hum yunqażūn(a).
verses.translation: Будь Наша воля, Мы могли б их потопить, И здесь никто б им не простер Ни помощи, ни избавленья

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا رَحْمَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11254'>ةً م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا وَمَتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>عًا إِلَىٰ ح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Illā raḥmatam minnā wa matā'an ilā ḥīn(in).
verses.translation: И лишь Своею милостью Мы им мирские блага На срок определенный раздаем

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11255'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa iżā qīla lahumuttaqū mā baina aidīkum wa mā khalfakum la'allakum turḥamūn(a).
verses.translation: Когда ж им говорят: "Побойтесь вы того, что ваши предки претерпели, А равно и того, что будет после вас, - Чтоб вам (Господню) милость обрести", (Они не внемлют)

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا تَأْتِيه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':3923'>ِم م</tajweed>ِّنْ ءَايَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3924'>ةٍ م</tajweed>ِّنْ ءَايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَنْهَا مُعْرِض<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā ta'tīhim min āyatim min āyāti rabbihim illā kānū 'anhā mu'riḍīn(a).
verses.translation: И нет ни одного из всех знамений Бога, Которое они бы не отвергли

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':1460'>نف</tajweed>ِقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا رَزَقَكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3751'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ قَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':590'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَنُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11256'>طْ</tajweed>عِمُ م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11257'>َن ل</tajweed>َّوْ يَش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6988'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11258'>طْ</tajweed>عَمَهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> إِنْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':428'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':2393'>لٍ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa iżā qīla lahum anfiqū mimmā razaqakumullāh(u), qālal-lażīna kafarū lil-lażīna āmanū anuṭ'imu mal lau yasyā'ullāhu aṭ'amah(ū), in antum illā fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
verses.translation: Когда ж им говорят: "Пожертвуйте хотя б немногим из того, Чем наделил вас Бог", Неверные глаголют верующим так: "Пристало ль нам кормить всех тех, Кого Господь, будь Его воля, накормил бы Сам? Здесь вы находитесь в глубоком заблужденье

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6081'>ٱ</tajweed>لْوَعْدُ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':109'>ن ك</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yaqūlūna matā hāżal-wa'du in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
verses.translation: И говорят они: "Коль истину вы нам несете, Когда же это обещание свершится

verses.text_uthmani: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَا يَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':1141'>نظ</tajweed>ُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11222'>ةً و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِدَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11259'>ةً ت</tajweed>َأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Mā yanẓurūna illā ṣaiḥataw wāḥidatan ta'khużuhum wa hum yakhiṣṣimūn(a).
verses.translation: И им не предстоит увидеть ничего, - Один лишь вскрик настигнет их, Пока они все меж собой разноголосят

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11260'>ةً و</tajweed>َل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falā yastaṭī'ūna tauṣiyataw wa lā ilā ahlihim yarji'ūn(a).
verses.translation: И не дано им будет завершить свои дела, И не вернуться им к родным и близким

verses.text_uthmani: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَنُفِخَ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4185'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صُّورِ فَإِذَا ه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':10171'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11261'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11262'>جْ</tajweed>دَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8857'>نس</tajweed>ِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa nufikha fiṣ-ṣūri fa'iżā hum minal-ajdāṡi ilā rabbihim yansilūn(a).
verses.translation: Раздастся трубный глас, и из могил своих Поднимутся и устремятся к Богу люди

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>وَيْلَنَا م<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':11263'>َنۢ ب</tajweed>َعَثَنَا م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11264'>ِن م</tajweed>َّرْقَدِنَاۜ‌ۗ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا مَا وَعَدَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8377'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّحْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ وَصَدَقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11265'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُرْسَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū yā wailanā mam ba'aṡanā mim marqadinā…hāżā mā wa'adar-raḥmānu wa ṣadaqal-mursalūn(a).
verses.translation: И возгласят они: "О, горе нам! Кто поднял нас из мест упокоенья?" (Им голос прозвучит): "Всемилостивый Бог вам это обещал, И правду вам несли посланники Его

verses.text_uthmani: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':489'>ن ك</tajweed>َانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11222'>ةً و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِدَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11223'>ةً ف</tajweed>َإِذَا هُمْ جَمِي<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11227'>عٌ ل</tajweed>َّدَيْنَا مُحْضَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: In kānat illā ṣaiḥataw wāḥidatan fa'iżā hum jamī'ul ladainā muḥḍarūn(a).
verses.translation: Один лишь вскрик - И вот они предстали перед Нами

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8774'>سٌ ش</tajweed>َيْـ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':232'>ـًٔا و</tajweed>َلَا تُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4248'>جْ</tajweed>زَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَعْمَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fal-yauma lā tuẓlamu nafsun syai'aw wa lā tujzauna illā mā kuntum ta'malūn(a).
verses.translation: В тот День Не будет ни одна душа обижена не по заслугам, И вам воздастся лишь за те поступки, Которые вы совершили (в ближней жизни)

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَـٰكِهُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4715'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َةِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11266'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11267'>لٍ ف</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Inna aṣḥābal-jannatil-yauma fī syugulin fākihūn(a).
verses.translation: Поистине, в тот День Все обитатели садов Эдема Восторгу радостному предадутся

verses.text_uthmani: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هُمْ وَأَزْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>جُهُمْ فِى ظِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لٍ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8058'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِكِ مُتَّكِــٔ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Hum wa azwājuhum fī ẓilālin 'alal-arā'iki muttaki'ūn(a).
verses.translation: Они с супругами своими В тени на ложах будут возлежать

verses.text_uthmani: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِهَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11268'>ةٌ و</tajweed>َلَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':7443'>ُم م</tajweed>َّا يَدَّع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lahum fīhā fākihatuw wa lahum mā yadda'ūn(a).
verses.translation: И все плоды, и все, что (души) их желают, Они будут иметь (сполна)

verses.text_uthmani: سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11269'>مٌ ق</tajweed>َوْل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11270'>اً م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11271'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11272'>بٍّ ر</tajweed>َّح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Salāmun qaulam mir rabbir raḥīm(in).
verses.translation: Мир вам! - Прямой привет от Милосердного Аллаха

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱمْتَـٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>مْتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>زُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11273'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11274'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':5255'>جْ</tajweed>رِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wamtāzul-yauma  ayyuhal-mujrimūn(a).
verses.translation: (И прозвучит): "О вы, погрязшие в грехах! В День этот отделитесь

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11275'>دْ</tajweed> إِلَيْكُمْ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بَن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> ءَادَمَ أ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4908'>َن ل</tajweed>َّا تَعْبُدُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11276'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّيْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَكُمْ عَدُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':873'>وٌّ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Alam a'had ilaikum yā banī ādama allā ta'budusy-syaiṭān(a), innahū lakum 'aduwwum mubīn(un).
verses.translation: Не Я ли заповЕдал вам, Адамовы сыны, Не поклоняться Сатане, - Ведь он ваш враг заклятый

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11277'>ٱ</tajweed>عْبُدُونِى‌ۚ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا صِر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':1947'>طٌ م</tajweed>ُّسْتَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ani'budūnī, hāżā ṣirāṭum mustaqīm(un).
verses.translation: Меня вы почитать должны, - Таков путь истинный

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> أَضَلَّ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':344'>نك</tajweed>ُمْ جِبِل<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11278'>اًّ ك</tajweed>َثِيرًا‌ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> تَعْقِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kaṡīrā(n), afalam takūnū ta'qilūn(a).
verses.translation: Увлек он множество людей от праведной стези, - Ужель вы этого не поняли еще

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> جَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11279'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّتِى كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تُوعَد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Hāżihī jahannamul-latī kuntum tū'adūn(a).
verses.translation: Вот Ад, Который вам обещан был

verses.text_uthmani: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱصْلَوْهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11280'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَكْفُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iṣlauhal-yauma bimā kuntum takfurūn(a).
verses.translation: И в этот День Гореть в Огне вам За то, что не уверовали (в Бога)

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَفْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>هِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':11281'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِمَا كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَكْسِب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Al-yauma nakhtimu 'alā afwāhihim wa tukallimunā aidīhim wa tasyhadu arjuluhum bimā kānū yaksibūn(a).
verses.translation: И в этот День Уста Мы им скрепим - И руки их Нам будут говорить, Свидетелями их деяний станут ноги

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَوْ نَش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11282'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَبَقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11283'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صِّر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>طَ فَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َىٰ يُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':60'>بْ</tajweed>صِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lau nasyā'u laṭamasnā 'alā a'yunihim fastabaquṣ-ṣirāṭa fa annā yubṣirūn(a).
verses.translation: Будь Наша воля, Мы б зрения лишили их - И, обгоняя и толкаясь, Они бы устремились к Аль Сирату. Но как им остается видеть

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَوْ نَش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ لَمَسَخْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11284'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>عُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مُضِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11285'>ًّا و</tajweed>َلَا يَرْجِع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lau nasyā'u lamasakhnāhum 'alā makānatihim famastaṭā'ū muḍiyyaw wa lā yarji'ūn(a).
verses.translation: Будь Наша воля, Мы бы придали им недвижимую форму, И не смогли б они тогда ни двигаться вперёд, (Ни обратиться вспять)

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11286'>َن ن</tajweed>ُّعَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ِرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4788'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَلْقِ‌ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa man nu'ammirhu nunakkishu fil-khalq(i), afalā ya'qilūn(a).
verses.translation: Кому Мы жизнь долгую даруем, Тому Мы спину гнем с годами, - Ужель и этого они не разумеют

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11287'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شِّعْرَ وَمَا يَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':8425'>نۢب</tajweed>َغِى لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ‌ۚ</tajweed> إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11288'>رٌ و</tajweed>َقُرْءَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11289'>نٌ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā 'allamnāhusy-syi'ra wa mā yambagī lah(ū), in huwa illā żikruw wa qur'ānum mubīn(un).
verses.translation: Слагать стихи Мы не учили Мухаммада, И не годится это для него. Послание сие - напоминание Господне И ясные заветы Аль Кор'ана

verses.text_uthmani: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِّيُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7947'>نذ</tajweed>ِرَ مَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':506'>ن ك</tajweed>َانَ حَي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11290'>ًّا و</tajweed>َيَحِقَّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11291'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَوْلُ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':468'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Liyunżira man kāna ḥayyaw wa yaḥiqqal-qaulu 'alal-kāfirīn(a).
verses.translation: Для увещания всех тех, кто жив, А также для свершения Господних приговоров Для тех, кто верой пренебрег

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَـٰلِكُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':5159'>قْ</tajweed>نَا لَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':402'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِين<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَنْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11292'>مًا ف</tajweed>َهُمْ لَهَا مَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Awalam yarau annā khalaqnā lahum mimmā 'amilat aidīnā an'āman fahum lahā mālikūn(a).
verses.translation: Ужель не ведают они, что среди многих прочих Руками Нашими построенных вещей Мы создали (домашний) скот и им они владеют

verses.text_uthmani: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَذَلَّلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa żallalnāhā lahum fa minhā rakūbuhum wa minhā ya'kulūn(a).
verses.translation: Мы этот скот поставили на службу им: Одних они едят, других используют для переездов

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ‌ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lahum fīhā manāfi'u wa masyārib(u), afalā yasykurūn(a).
verses.translation: Для них здесь польза и питье, - Ужель за это Нам они не будут благодарны

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّخَذُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':107'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':108'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ ءَالِهَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11293'>ةً ل</tajweed>َّعَلَّهُمْ يُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':237'>نص</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wattakhażū min dūnillāhi ālihatal la'allahum yunṣarūn(a).
verses.translation: И все ж они берут других богов, кроме Аллаха, С надеждой, что получат помощь

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُن<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11294'>دٌ م</tajweed>ُّحْضَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lā yastaṭī'ūna naṣrahum, wa hum lahum jundum muḥḍarūn(a).
verses.translation: Но нет возможности помочь им (у других богов), И (в Судный День) единою толпою Предстанут предо Мной они

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَا يَحْزُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2435'>نك</tajweed>َ قَوْلُهُمْ‌ۘ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falā yaḥzunka qauluhum, innā na'lamu mā yusirrūna wa mā yu'linūn(a).
verses.translation: Пусть не печалят их слова тебя, (о Мухаммад!). Поистине, Мы знаем, что сокрыто ими, А что открыто (напоказ)

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11295'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2732'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7232'>قْ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7325'>ِن ن</tajweed>ُّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7326'>طْ</tajweed>فَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7327'>ةٍ ف</tajweed>َإِذَا هُوَ خَصِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7328'>مٌ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Awalam yaral-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min nuṭfatin fa'iżā huwa khaṣīmum mubīn(un).
verses.translation: Ужель не видит человек, Что Мы его из капли спермы сотворили? Увы! Он перед Нами предстает с открытою враждой

verses.text_uthmani: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11296'>اً و</tajweed>َنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed>‌ۖ قَالَ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11297'>َن ي</tajweed>ُحْىِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11298'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعِظَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مَ وَهِىَ رَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ḍaraba lanā maṡalaw wa nasiya khalqah(ū), qāla may yuḥyil-'iẓāma wa hiya ramīm(un).
verses.translation: Он предлагает притчи Нам, Забыв о том, как сам был создан, И молвит он: "Кто может жизнь вернуть сухим костям, Когда они (к тому ж) истлели

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ

verses.translation: Ответь ему: "Их оживит лишь Тот, Кто создал их первоначально; Тот, Кто всеведущ в каждом виде созиданья

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allażī ja'ala lakum minasy-syajaril-akhḍari nārā(n), fa'iżā antum minhu tūqidūn(a).
verses.translation: Он - Тот, Кто создал вам огонь из дерева живого, И от него вы зажигаете свои огни

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Awa laisal-lażī khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa biqādirin 'alā ay yakhluqa miṡlahum, balā wa huwal-khallāqul-'alīm(u).
verses.translation: Но разве не способен Тот, Кто землю и Вселенную построил, Создать подобные миры? Воистину, Он может! Создатель высший! Он один Исполнен знаньем необъятным И мастерством, не знающим границ

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innamā amruhū iżā arāda syai'an ay yaqūla lahū kun fa yakūn(u).
verses.translation: Когда задумано творенье Им, Он молвит: "Будь!" - и явится оно

verses.text_uthmani: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa subḥānal-lażī biyadihī malakūtu kulli syai'iw wa ilaihi turja'ūn(a).
verses.translation: Хвала Владыке, Чья Рука Вершит господство над мирами! К Нему мы завершаем путь земной, (что начат Им)
